abstract: BHP Billiton said on Wednesday it was considering possible next moves in its attempt to open takeover talks with a rival mining company, Rio Tinto, which has so far rebuffed its overtures.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton said on Wednesday it was considering possible next moves in its attempt to open takeover talks with a rival mining company, Rio Tinto, which has so far rebuffed its overtures.

headline.main: BHP Considers Next Move in Rio Tinto Bid
